meanings.definition: The aspect of someone's character that is presented to or perceived by others.
meanings.sent1: Her persona at work is very professional and serious.
meanings.sent2: She created a friendly persona to make new friends easily.
meanings.sent3: His persona as a superhero at the costume party was a hit.
meanings.sent4: The politician's persona as a caring leader resonated with the voters.
meanings.sent5: The actor's persona on stage captivated the audience.

meanings.definition: A role or character adopted by an author or actor.
meanings.sent1: In the play, she took on the persona of a wise old woman.
meanings.sent2: The author's persona in his novels is often mysterious and intriguing.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's persona as a clumsy waiter always gets laughs.
meanings.sent4: The singer's persona as a rebel without a cause appealed to the youth.
meanings.sent5: The artist's persona as a misunderstood genius added depth to his work.
